name: It's Spikey
description:
WASD to control camera and mouse click to click see if a square is "spikey". If it is spikey, you die and will have to refresh as a new color. Takes a little while to load initially.

If the embedded version does not load, try this one:
http://zesapolis.com/itsspikey/

Update post jam:
Somewhat working massive multiplayer mine sweeper rouge-lite. : )

Jam submission note:
Meant to be some sort of light weight socket IO fun massive multiplayer thing. Instead it is this, whatever that is. : )
